author: jgm
content: I'd suggest that we keep devnet 4 around until we're happy that zhejiang is working post-capella.  If not, devnet 4 could be a place to test out patches quickly.

author: barnabasbusa
content: Yeah we will have Capella on zhejiang tomorrow. Assuming it all goes smoothly, I don’t see much reason to have devnet4 still around afterwards.
